error.400: Some fields contain errors. Please correct them and try again.
error.401: Your session has expired or you do not have permission to perform this action.
error.403: You do not have permission to access this resource.
error.404: The requested resource is not available.
error.500: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
error.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.noInternet: No internet connection. Please check your connection and try again.
